(When I glanced over at the lake, I saw Tohka
sadly staring across its surface, on top of the
short bridge leading to the outlet tower.)

(Ah man... I bet she's still worried about what
happened at the theater... She looks pretty
down in the dumps...)

(Maybe it'd be better if I took her
mind off things...)
Tohka? There you are.
Sh-Shido...! Why...?
Why? I just wanted to talk to you.
Oh, I see...

(She seems pretty depressed... Maybe I could talk
about something to change her mood?)

(Or, maybe... at times like these, perhaps it's
best to not say anything unnecessary, and
stay beside her quietly?)
(I wonder which one...)
Try saying something.
Be quiet and stay by her side.

(I really should talk about something, anything.
Even if I can't think of the best topic, she might
cheer up just by having someone talk to her...)
Umm... Tohka?
Hmm...?

Er, well... I wanted to apologize.
Also... thanks.
Wh-What for, all of a sudden?

Well... I've been thinking that I wanted to
apologize to you at some point, but I also
thought that I wanted to thank you.

When I was scared of the existence of Spirits
because of what happened with Kurumi, there was a
time when I... shook off your hand, right?
Oh... back then. I was not bothered by...

No, no matter what reason I had, I can't forgive
myself for shaking off your hand like that.
Shido...

So... I'm sorry... And then, when I was trying
to figure out what to do, you were the one to
reach your hand out to me.
Hmm, did I...?

Yeah... It's not like you and Yoshino appeared
and destroyed the world, or fought the AST
just because you wanted to, right?
Y-Yes...

It was different with Kurumi. I don't know if it's
true now, but there was no mistake at the time:
She was attacking people of her own free will.

But... you taught me, Tohka. With your warmth, you
helped me to remember...
So, thank you.

I-I see... Shido, thank you... You are trying
to cheer me up, aren't you?

Er, well... I just said how I really feel,
that's all.

Yes, I know... That's what warmed my heart.
I thank you, Shido.

Haha, getting thanked even though I thanked you,
that's kind of funny.
I suppose that's true...
Ahahaha...!
Hahaha...

(Yeah, it was good that I talked to Tohka. To be
able to see her smile again, even a little.)
Shido...
Hmm?

I studied so hard... and learned so many things...
But why am I no good...?

(Oh, I see...Tohka was worried about studying
for the test...)

Hey, Tohka... There are different things that
people are suited for or not suited for.

Rather than trying things that are too difficult,
I think it's good sometimes to focus on things
you can do well, and work towards those, you know?

N-Not suitable...? D-Do you think
that too, Shido...?

Er, well... I just think you don't have to push
yourself so much.

Of course everyone has something they can't do.
Sometimes it's necessary to accept that part of
you that's no good.

Instead, you can improve what you're a natural at,
and... Huh?
*Sniffle*...*sniffle*...*sob*...!
T-Tohka...?

E-Even then... I...*sob*...!
I-I wanted to try my hardest...
f-for you... for you...!
Huh? Wait, what do you mean by...?!
*Sniffle*...*sob*...!!!!
H-Hey! Where are you going? Tohka!
(O-Oh man... Did I mess up again...?)

maybe my feelings can be felt by being nearby.)
